task.title: Disallow external redirects
Authenticate end users
Centralize authorization
Use cryptographically secure random numbers
Authorize every page
Apply principles of privacy when handling personal information
Review non-categorized/miscellaneous findings from static code analysis
Invalidate old session ID after authentication
Prevent buffer overflow/underflow
Avoid uncontrolled format string
Ensure confidential data is sent over secure channel
Enforce absolute session timeouts
Perform input validation on all forms of input
Escape untrusted data in HTML, HTML attributes, Cascading Style Sheets and JavaScript
Bind variables in SQL statements
Disallow carriage returns and line feeds when adding data to HTTP response headers
Use XML encoding when interacting with XML data
Use Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) encoding when interacting with LDAP data
Avoid relying on untrusted data for server side page, view, or template selection
Avoid unsafe operating system interaction
Remove/disable unused, test or debug code and data
Use indirect object reference maps if accessing files
Validate all untrusted XML input
Implement account lockout or authentication throttling
Enforce page navigation
Use safe arithmetic to avoid integer overflow
